Game engine for MoonScript, in MoonScript
Open Source. Windows, Mac OS X, Linux, Android, iOS and Ouya.

Modules

yae.accelerometer User input from accelerometer (works only on mobile devices).
yae.audio Handles creating, playing and manipulating sound and music instances.
yae.compass User input from compass (works only on mobile devices).
yae.filesystem Allows manipulation with files and directories.
yae.graphics Provides simple way to load, render and draw things.
yae.java Provides direct access to Java
yae.keyboard User input from keyboard.
yae.mouse User input from mouse (works only on desktop devices).
yae.system Provides many usefull methods for managing your current device.
yae.timer Provides high-resolution timing functionality.
yae.touch User input from touch screen (works only on mobile devices).
yae.window Provides an interface for modifying and retrieving information about the program's window.

Classes

yae.File Represents a file on the filesystem.
yae.Font Defines the shape of characters that can be drawn onto the screen.
yae.Image Drawable image type
yae.Quad A quadrilateral (a polygon with four sides and four corners) with texture coordinate information.
yae.Source A Source represents audio you can play back.
